patthana15.24:1.1: Hetusampayuttaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetusampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana15.24:2.1: Hetusampayuttaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetusampayutto naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.24:3.1: Hetuvippayuttaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nahetuvippayutto naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
